title: Executive Order 7881-Power Site Restoration No. 489, Partial Revocation of Executive Order of June 30, 1916, Creating Power Site Reserve No. 533
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, 37 Stat. 497, the Executive Order of June 30, 1916, creating Power Site Reserve No. 533, is hereby revoked as to the following-described lands:
T. 28 N., R. 12 E., sec. 30, S½NW¼.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7881-Power Site Restoration No. 489, Partial Revocation of Executive Order of June 30, 1916, Creating Power Site Reserve No. 533 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371845
